title: Third British skier dies in French avalanche just days after two others lost their lives
tags: Two British nationals were also killed in the French ski resort of Val d’Isère on Friday last week;Keir Starmer to make first appearance since council election U-turn as PM rushes to Reform target;Labour fights to defend three seats from Reform UK in key by-election battles across Britain;'Keir Starmer has been humiliated by a group of plucky Chagossians - this will be his 16th U-turn';The GB News Editorial Charter
